text: Fearless Hyena is a 1979 Hong Kong action comedy movie directed by first time director Jackie Chan (who also stars) and stars James Tien, Dean Shek, Lee Kwan, Eagle Han-ying. It was distributed by Lung Cheung Company Limited. ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 action movies Category:1979 comedy movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jackie Chan
title: The Fearless Hyena
